metadata.creator: Tallien, Jean-Lambert, 1767-2565

metadata.description: At head of title: République française
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, IV:1, 33941
Concerns the revolt in Chartres against Tellier and his suicide
Inscribed at end: Au juge de pais du canton de Mazan
metadata.notes: Title is on the cover. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
